modmenu.descriptionTranslation.cem: Allows for loading custom models into the game as defined by .jem and .jpm files in a resource pack.
config.cem.use_optifine_folder.tooltip:
This will load CEM models from assets/minecraft/optifine/cem,
which is exactly what optifine does.
Reload resources (F3 + T) for this to take effect!
config.cem.use_new_model_creation_fix.to:
This prevents minecraft from directly moving
your model parts around when animating.
This breaks a few models but fixes other ones.
Please use if possible.
Reload resources (F3 + T) for this to take effect!
config.cem.use_old_animations.tooltip:
This restores animation behavior from CEM version <=0.6.2.
You probably want this off.
